servinfosub.title: Description
servinfosub.ptxt: If the signal voltage of G sensor while at a stop does not vary of from that while running, this DTC is set.
Therefore, this DTC may be set when a vehicle is lifted up and its wheel(s) is turned. In such case, clear the DTC and check again.

s1.ptxt: Check for proper connection from harness to control module.
If OK, substitute an ABS hydraulic unit/control module assembly with correct part number.
